fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / HARDIE
fields.Description:
Titus Hardie, leader of the militant union wing Hardie Boys. Mass dialogue + Gardener and Boys:

1) Admit they lynched the man because of a rape.
2) WHITE: Rhetoric to get them to tell you Klaasje was victim (Evrart makes easier -- leads to Klaasje, Klaasje betrays)
3) React to Klaasje's betrayal
4) WHITE: Suggestion to get them to counterbetray and reveal Assassination
5) something to get them to reveal Instigator (Ruby)

fields.Title: START
input
Suggestion: "The *boys* are too eager to please..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The *boys* are too eager to please him to keep their mouths shut. You're gonna get a good head count here, just wait...

fields.Title: You: ""I'm going to level with you. She's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm going to level with you. She's the next link in the chain that leads me to the mercenary's killer."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm going to level with you. She's the next link in the chain that leads me to Lely's killer."

fields.Title: Composure: "He and his men carry themselves lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He and his men carry themselves like giants. You'll need to prove your mettle to be taken seriously.

fields.Title: You: ""I have seen her in a laudanum-indu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have seen her in a laudanum-induced delirium. The paranormal instinct whispers her name into my ear."

fields.Title: You: ""I suspect she killed the victim --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suspect she killed the victim -- that's why."

fields.Title: You: "What are *you* doing?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What are *you* doing?

fields.Title: You: ""We need to talk about the man hang..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We need to talk about the man hanged out back."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""I can't for the life of me underst..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't for the life of me understand why you did it." He spreads his arms. "I mean... I would have just left him up there. You must really like cleaning up other people's shit."

fields.Title: Glen: ""Yeah, gave them real nice big dick..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, gave them real nice big dicks."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
You: ""I did think that, yes -- that she'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did think that, yes -- that she's a *little* crazy..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Lawman..." he says through clenche..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lawman..." he says through clenched teeth. "... I am at the end of my *goddamn* rope with you. I fucking told you not to push her!"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Goddamn *no one* tells you to put y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Goddamn *no one* tells you to put your fists down!

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You think we go into this shit dea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think we go into this shit deaf and dumb? You RCM aren't the only ones who know how to bug people -- there's no university degree for that."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Actually there are a few -- cryptoa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Actually there are a few -- cryptoanalyst, radio officer...

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Don't put yourself down, Angus. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't put yourself down, Angus. It's important work." The chief picks his beer back up -- to offer a silent toast.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Don't think I forgot how I specifi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't think I forgot how I specifically let you know how I felt about her arrest either." He says shaking his head. "Now what do you want?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The rage in his eyes - you see the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The rage in his eyes - you see the moment it burns out into a state of *finished*. "Sure. Sure, lawman. You do you." He cracks a can, fills up his mug, downs it, and says: "I'll do Titus and get fucking wasted."

fields.Title: Half Light: "His anger flares -- here it comes....."
fields.Dialogue Text: His anger flares -- here it comes...! The blistering apathy of *fucking done*.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
mini hub for serenity
Titus Hardie: ""Incriminating... now that's a big..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Incriminating... now that's a big boy word." He puts his beer can down.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No. How about you keep sticking aro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. How about you keep sticking around? Look around -- find the company representative, see what they have to say? Maybe the company will help? Then get back to this.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah, fuck off!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, fuck off!"

fields.Title: Authority: "He's used to giving orders and havi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's used to giving orders and having them obeyed immediately. You should not indulge him.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""That's not nearly enough. I don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's not nearly enough. I don't wanna be *rude*, but we kinda have our own thing going here. Unless you got a *sound theory* implicating Ruby I think you should just take off."

IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Elizabeth: ""For the record..." she steps in, f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For the record..." she steps in, forcefully. "Titus Hardie did not explicitly specify the *victim* as a whore. Nor did he say anything about trusting her."

fields.Title: Alain: ""She's just in denial, asshole. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She's just in denial, asshole. You don't understand the *traumatic experience*. She's shutting down. And she doesn't fucking trust you."

fields.Title: You: ""A few more things about the tape b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A few more things about the tape before I go listen to it..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What's on it? We call it the Doorg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's on it? We call it the Doorgunner Megamix. You'll know why, once you listen to it."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Stop it. This is a waste of everyo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stop it. This is a waste of everyone's time." She sounds agitated. "I think we have already established that you're not going to single anyone out."

fields.Dialogue Text: Shift your centre of balance from one leg to another.

You: ""So I've listened to the tape and I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I've listened to the tape and I'm going to confront Klaasje with it."

fields.Title: You: ""How long have you been listening t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long have you been listening to their communications?"

fields.Title: You: ""Hold up, her face -- what did it l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold up, her face -- what did it look like?"

fields.Title: You: ""That was the *normal* thing to do...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was the *normal* thing to do. She was a flight risk. I'm a cop."

Titus Hardie: ""No-no-no," he points at himself, "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No-no-no," he points at himself, "eyes here! You got business with my boys, you got business with me."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Theo: "Sitting on his right: standard work..."]
You: ""First, we need to talk about your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First, we need to talk about your attitude."

fields.Title: Glen: ""Hey asshole, up here! We're talkin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey asshole, up here! We're talking to you!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Why?" He leans back and regards yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?" He leans back and regards you with curiosity.

fields.Title: Glen: ""Hey, I don't... oh, okay..." Glen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, I don't... oh, okay..." Glen bursts out laughing. "Yeah, take me!"

fields.Title: You: ""A civil war is brewing and the onl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A civil war is brewing and the only way to prevent it is to solve the murder. That means talking to Ruby."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yes, she's crazy, you know," the r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, she's crazy, you know," the rat-faced man says carefully. "A crazy-bitch -- you know the type. She's fucked up."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "When she's angry, she emphasizes th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: When she's angry, she emphasizes the *s*. It gives her voice a strangely hypnotic quality. Her lips barely move as she speaks.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Okay, okay... easy, fellows. Give..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, okay... easy, fellows. Give the guy a break. He's obviously one of god's special people."

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Suggestion: "These guys are so macho they're rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These guys are so macho they're ready to confess to first-degree murder. Ask if it was them.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "With begrudging respect he leans ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With begrudging respect he leans back. The room around you is silent. Time to speak now. With words.

fields.Title: Logic: "Or... don't get in his face *yet*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Or... don't get in his face *yet*. Wait. You may need to *establish* yourself in his eyes later. If you fail, doing this may give you a fresh chance!

fields.Title: Suggestion: "There's laughter in the room. Try n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's laughter in the room. Try not to kill yourself this time.

fields.Title: Jump to: [tapehub]
Titus Hardie: ""Goddamn you, Sunboy..." He says qu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamn you, Sunboy..." He says quietly. "I guess there's nothing to do about it now. I just hope she can game her way through the system and come out the other way."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "He stares at you, as if you'd just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He stares at you, as if you'd just called him your choicest expletive. "Excuse me? What the fuck was that?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [gaveuprubyhub]
You: ""Because she's your real leader.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because she's your real leader."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "From the corner of your eye you see..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From the corner of your eye you see a little bird fly into the bush -- right behind the window; behind Titus' back.

fields.Dialogue Text: "You're sure taking your time. Waiting for him to get ripe and pretty for you, huh?"

fields.Dialogue Text: "Understood -- you've listened in on their communications." He takes a little note. "How long?"

Shanky: ""You sure took your time, huh?" He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You sure took your time, huh?" He looks to Titus for approval. "Waited for him to get real ripe and pretty for you?"

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""You might want to start asking you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You might want to start asking your questions now. It's not going to get better than this."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Probably," the scars on his arms s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Probably," the scars on his arms say. "I need to be like this to lead them -- something *you* would understand."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "*Good*, the twitch in his eye repli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Good*, the twitch in his eye replies. *I've beaten a man so hard he doesn't move. Or maybe I kept his head underwater? Hard to say which, but you can feel the *ugly* in me too.*

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What?" He doesn't understand."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?" He doesn't understand.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Nothing to do about it now I guess..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing to do about it now I guess." He nods slowly. "I just hope she can game her way through the system."

fields.Title: You: ""Fuck with the Sunboy." (Point to y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck with the Sunboy." (Point to yourself) "Get burnt."

fields.Title: You: ""I can finish this without listenin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can finish this without listening to the tape." (Do not take it.)

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You're coo-coo, cop." His smile hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're coo-coo, cop." His smile hides a flash of anger. "I'm the *only* man responsible for this unit -- get with it, or fuck off."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Nope." That's all he says. He does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nope." That's all he says. He doesn't even do anything.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Next question.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Next question."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm going to take off now." [Leave..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm going to take off now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I talked to Klaasje. Now I n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I talked to Klaasje. Now I need to talk to Ruby."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Sounds like you're *making* her a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like you're *making* her a suspect in this. Not on my watch you're not."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There's *a lot* of questions. If yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's *a lot* of questions. If you ask them now they'll just keep bringing up the tape. Listen to it and they'll have nothing to hide behind.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""The coppernado is back..." He smir..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The coppernado is back..." He smirks. "What do you want?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Precinct 57th's finest scans the ro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Precinct 57th's finest scans the room, leaving the speaking to you: He trusts you -- maybe against his better judgement, but he does.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You do that," he says, adjusting h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You do that," he says, adjusting his belt buckle. "Oh, and keep it -- maybe you'll need a reminder of human ugliness some day."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Good. Glad to hear that," he says,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Glad to hear that," he says, adjusting his belt buckle. "You can keep it, too -- maybe you'll need a reminder of human ugliness some day."

fields.Title: Hardiehub1
You: "The chatter is too inane to reach y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The chatter is too inane to reach your ears: Raise your chin and gaze into the distance like a prince.

fields.Title: You: ""So what's on this tape?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So what's on this tape?"

fields.Title: You: ""Where can I listen to this?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where can I listen to this?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You've hit a nerve. Titus is furiou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've hit a nerve. Titus is furious -- no, more than that -- the loyal Titus feels *betrayed*.

Titus Hardie: ""Yeah... Khm, anyways..." He wraps..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah... Khm, anyways..." He wraps it up.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""It's you again..." He acknowledges..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's you again..." He acknowledges you gruffly. "What is it?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, you ruthless son of a bitch...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, you ruthless son of a bitch." He nods approvingly. "I certainly didn't have it in me -- I always let the pretty ones go. I'm soft like that."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""And what do you do? You go and pus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And what do you do? You go and push her anyway!" Something breaks in him. He takes a step closer. "I am going to... fucking..."

fields.Title: You: ""Har-Mageddon is upon us. She's bet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Har-Mageddon is upon us. She's better off in the holding-pen once the Blood Rains come down."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Composure: "Wants the world to know he's a mach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wants the world to know he's a macho-macho man: tobacco-chewing and knuckle-cracking. Who else do we have here?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we'll keep sticking around..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think we'll keep sticking around, Titus. We haven't even talked to the company rep yet -- we should do that," he turns to you. "She's on the pier I believe... northwest."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "*I can do this all night long*, his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *I can do this all night long*, his clenched fists say, their knuckles turning white. *I'm young. You're fifty thousand years old*.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Oh, this is about him?" He looks a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, this is about him?" He looks around. "A real looker, that one..."

fields.Title: Glen: ""Oh, he's a real pretty boy by now...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, he's a real pretty boy by now. REAL hot stuff!" Glen nods along. "Letting out that *pretty-boy smell*."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Elizabeth: ""You might want to start asking you..."]
Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
You: "In that time I have killed. More th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In that time I have killed. More than once. I can feel it in me. *The ugly.*

fields.Title: Authority: "Success. Titus backs off. Fists dow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Success. Titus backs off. Fists down, everybody.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Beer."
fields.Dialogue Text: Beer.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know what that means. It j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know what that means. It just popped in my head. Let's move on."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Don't forget your tape, lawman." H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't forget your tape, lawman." He pushes the little tape toward you with his giant hand. "Compliments of Titus Hardie."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Titus Hardie: ""Oh, this is about him?" He looks a..."]
Jump to: [Titus Hardie: ""Oh, this is about him?" He looks a..."]
Jump to: [EVIDENCE HUB]
You: ""I found eight sets of footprints,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I found eight sets of footprints, but there's only seven of you. Where is the eighth Hardie boy?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "...hit you -- duck!"
fields.Dialogue Text: ...hit you -- duck!

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""*You don't get to tell me what to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*You don't get to tell me what to do*." He impersonates you. The crowd laughs again...

fields.Title: You: "Don't say anything yet."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't say anything yet.

IsKimHere()

Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Inland Empire: "Frankly it's a bit terrifying."
fields.Dialogue Text: Frankly it's a bit terrifying.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure we can find a tape player..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sure we can find a tape player. It's not a problem," he repeats calmly in a hushed voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wh-why would you say that?" He tur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wh-why would you say that?" He turns to Titus. "Ruby is just the next logical link in the investigation. If we can talk to her we can *eliminate* her as a suspect."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, what?"

Variable["TASK.arrest_klaasje_done"]
!(Variable["TASK.arrest_klaasje_done"])
Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Shanky: "The small man mimes blowing his bra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The small man mimes blowing his brains out. You see his rat-face contorted in mock despair, his fingers touching his temple.

fields.Title: You: ""So you've bugged them? How?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you've bugged them? How?"

fields.Title: You: ""Which one of you is doing this adv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which one of you is doing this advanced radio work then?"

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Yeah, man, you're like a radio gen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, man, you're like a radio genius or something. Those notes are some in depth stuff. Indexes and shit."

fields.Title: Jump to: [whirling.hardie_authority_wc_to_get_ ...]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're looking for Titus Hardie." T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're looking for Titus Hardie." The lieutenant turns to the broad-shouldered man at the end of the table.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective." The lieutenant acknowl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective." The lieutenant acknowledges you with a sharp note. He's leaving it to you.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "The room is silent. The leader does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The room is silent. The leader does not flinch.

fields.Title: You: ""She is missing, and if you hide fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She is missing, and if you hide from the police in a murder investigation you become a suspect. That's how it works, guys."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Fuck!" The big man's eyes and vein..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck!" The big man's eyes and veins bulge. "I knew that fucking whore couldn't be trusted!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Oh, shut up and stay out of this,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, shut up and stay out of this, Liz!" He turns back to you. "He raped her. He was out of his fucking mind. You have no idea!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Listen. She wasn't raped." The lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen. She wasn't raped." The lieutenant's voice is beginning to betray his agitation. "The witness' statements were very clear."

fields.Title: tapehub
Shanky: ""'Where can I listen to this?'" he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Where can I listen to this?'" he mocks you. "Why don't you try shoving it up your ass, genius?!"

fields.Title: You: "Tilt your head from side to side, c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Tilt your head from side to side, cracking your neck.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "*What do you think you're doing?* y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *What do you think you're doing?* you hear, but his mouth isn't moving. It's the tension in his shoulders speaking.

fields.Title: Glen: ""Oh, he was a real pretty boy, hang..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, he was a real pretty boy, hanging up there... Letting out that *pretty-boy smell*."

fields.Title: Alain: ""Must be something in the water in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Must be something in the water in Jamrock," he says thoughtfully.

fields.Title: Variable["yard.sense_viscal_greeting_done"]
Variable["yard.sense_viscal_greeting_done"]
!(Variable["yard.sense_viscal_greeting_done"])
You: ""Why should I care about the tape?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why should I care about the tape? You lied to me."

fields.Title: Empathy: "His tone is friendly now and the la..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His tone is friendly now and the last words are actually accompanied with a little smile.

fields.Title: Shanky: "A burst of laughter in the room; th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A burst of laughter in the room; the little guy is the loudest. "Good one, Titus!" he fawns.

fields.Title: Authority: "How many times must I tell you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How many times must I tell you...

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Someone has to rush in to break the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone has to rush in to break the tension. The second in command.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""What, is he fucking kidding...? Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What, is he fucking kidding...? This guy high or something?" The little guy looks at his mates in disbelief.

fields.Title: Glen: ""Hey... HEY, DIPSHIT!!! You hard of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey... HEY, DIPSHIT!!! You hard of hearing or something?! The bossman is talking to you!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""That's *nothing*, that's just lega..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's *nothing*, that's just legalese. You don't even have a *sound theory*." He crosses his arms. "I don't wanna be rude, but we're trying to get some R&R here. Think you could fuck off now?"

fields.Title: You: ""She is a suspect in another case I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She is a suspect in another case I'm investigating. A drug smuggling."

fields.Dialogue Text: "She wasn't raped." The lieutenant's voice is beginning to betray his agitation. "The witness' statements were very clear."

fields.Dialogue Text: His hands become fists.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Goddamnit... you fucking questione..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamnit... you fucking questioned her, didn't you? I told you not to push her! I fucking told you!"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Goddamnit..." He clenches his fist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamnit..." He clenches his fists. "I show you all kinds of kindness, let you snoop around in my town -- and then I ask you one thing..."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "His hands become fists."
fields.Dialogue Text: His hands become fists.

fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, like when we let old Clancy's widow walk."

fields.Dialogue Text: "I ain't got time for this whack shit." He picks up a new beer can. "I just hope she can game her way through the system and come out the other end."

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Let him go, Titus." The woman rais..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let him go, Titus." The woman raises a hand, as if to draw the giant's attention away from you. "I'm sure he doesn't need it."

fields.Title: You: ""First, we need to talk about your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First, we need to talk about your attitude."

fields.Dialogue Text: Your room had one, or maybe it's too broken...

Physical Instrument: "This guy's tough... get the eye-twi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This guy's tough... get the eye-twitch going. You need to look *scary*.

fields.Title: You: ""I'll go listen to the tape.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll go listen to the tape."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""This is where you say your bit." A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is where you say your bit." A broad-shouldered man points at you with a beer can.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, boys... These janitors have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, boys... These janitors have a helluva job cut out for them. I mean, I wouldn't go in there for a million..." He slaps his forehead.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Questions? To hell with that. Get r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Questions? To hell with that. Get right up in the big dick's face -- physical confrontation.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah, like you have one? Smartass...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, like you have one? Smartass..." He looks to his left. There's a beer there that he forgot.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""We have machines." He nods. "We're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We have machines." He nods. "We're in logistics -- how do you think a harbour works? It's advanced stuff."

fields.Title: Fat Angus: ""It's not advanced," the heavy man..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not advanced," the heavy man wheezes. "You're just holed up in a coop all day, writing down what they say. It gets hot as hell in there."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Titus's posture is more relaxed tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus's posture is more relaxed than when you first met him. He is relieved that this Klaasje-business is finally over.

fields.Title: You: ""We need to talk about the man hang..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We need to talk about the man hanged out back."

fields.Title: Jump to: [LYNCHINGHUB]
You: ""I found someone who saw the hangin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I found someone who saw the hanging. A witness."

fields.Dialogue Text: "We need to talk about the man hanged out back."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Just dragged her away, huh? Stone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just dragged her away, huh? Stone cold..." He's still looking at the front door. "Didn't think you had it in you..."

fields.Title: You: ""Where did you get this tape?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where did you get this tape?"

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah, look at the big dick on that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, look at the big dick on that cop. Can't tell a dick that big what to do."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Titus Hardie: "He hunches forward. His right hand..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He hunches forward. His right hand starts tapping a quick little rhythm on his thigh: tap tap tap.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You failed here -- a weakness is a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You failed here -- a weakness is a weakness, not a strength. Time to speak now. With words.

fields.Title: Jump to: [tapehub]
Shanky: ""Things got nice and quiet after th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Things got nice and quiet after that."

fields.Title: You: ""One third of humanity will be *cul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One third of humanity will be *culled* -- and you're worried about a single lambe?!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Titus Hardie: ""Like hell you have." He leans back..."]
Glen: "Starting from the right: Boot size..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Starting from the right: Boot size 44. Blond man in his thirties. Overbearingly masculine.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ruby is missing. If you hide from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ruby is missing. If you hide from the police in a murder investigation you become a suspect. You know how it works, guys."

fields.Title: Alain: ""Show it to him, T." He turns to Ti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Show it to him, T." He turns to Titus, who's still breathing heavily. "What's the harm, right?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "'No, you're not. You're frail and y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'No, you're not. You're frail and your nerves are frayed. Old sadness weighs you down.' He refuses to budge.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""TIME TO GO TO WORK IN THE SHIT FAC..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "TIME TO GO TO WORK IN THE SHIT FACTORY!!!"

fields.Title: Alain: ""*Real* big dick cops... Look at th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Real* big dick cops... Look at them! Reckless, swinging in the wind."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""One lonesome clown... What a sad s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One lonesome clown... What a sad sight." He sighs. "What do you want?"

fields.Title: You: ""Crazy? What are you talking about?..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Crazy? What are you talking about? She was very lucid."

fields.Title: Alain: ""Pigs, T -- they don't care about g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pigs, T -- they don't care about getting the truth, they care about getting convictions. They're fucking keeping score on their bulletin boards."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Since way before their chief start..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Since way before their chief started taking swing lessons."

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah -- try not to whack off to it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah -- try not to whack off to it."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Can't say I wasn't sad to see her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can't say I wasn't sad to see her go -- our Klaasje there -- her face when your friend walked her out. Goddamn..." He shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: ""We need to talk about the man hang..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We need to talk about the man hanged out back."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Again? Just get the dead guy's aut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Again? Just get the dead guy's autograph -- since you're his biggest fan."

fields.Title: You: ""The man hanged in the backyard --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The man hanged in the backyard -- did you do it?"

fields.Title: You: ""I just found a *bullet* -- in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just found a *bullet* -- in the hanged man's head."
fields.Alternate1: "You still haven't explained the bullet I found in the hanged man's head."

fields.Title: You: ""There's an old catatonic lady in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's an old catatonic lady in the old fish market, on the other side of the bay. She needs help."

fields.Title: You: "Present a solid theory about why Ru..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Present a solid theory about why Ruby could've done it.

fields.Dialogue Text: "Ruby's one of us. We're not gonna throw her under your Moralintern steamroller, fuck that shit!"

fields.Title: Shanky: ""And fuck you too, moral-f*g!" He t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And fuck you too, moral-f*g!" He throws a glance at Titus as the last syllable leaves his lips. The big guy sighs.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Oh, you need a scapegoat?" The ten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, you need a scapegoat?" The tension leaves Titus' voice. "Why didn't you just say so to begin with, buddy? Here, have Glen here!"

Suggestion: "A whore, huh? A lot of that going a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A whore, huh? A lot of that going around lately. From the mouths of *distressed* men. Whatever the case, you've hit a nerve. He's angry -- no, more than that -- he feels *betrayed*.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""Evrart *personally* sent me to tak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Evrart *personally* sent me to take care of this. If this goes south we'll all be in the shit -- but you, Titus Hardie, are going to be buried. Am I understood?"

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, there are numerous degre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, there are numerous degrees you can get in signals intelligence."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Always the comedian..." He shrugs...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Always the comedian..." He shrugs. "Never mind. I just hope she can game her way through the system and come out the other way."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Smart boy. You go do that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Smart boy. You go do that."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe the Wild Pines has help to o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe the Wild Pines has help to offer if they won't? Maybe not. Either way -- we'll have a case against your Ruby soon enough."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Titus Hardie: "The big man laughs, nearly spitting..."]
You: ""Hey, about that *complex operation..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, about that *complex operation*  out of Rubys lorry -- I think that's tied to another case I'm working."

fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go over the rape victim again."

fields.Title: Drama: "Do not let their squeals disturb yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do not let their squeals disturb your serenity. These are but simple peasants, sire.

fields.Title: Alain: ""Look, copper." The tattooed man sn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, copper." The tattooed man snaps his fingers to get your attention. "We know the dead fuck was a rapist and a killer. We got him confessing to it on tape."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure we can find a tape player..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sure we can find a tape player," the lieutenant whispers.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yeah? What about it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah? What about it?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Titus Hardie: ""Sounds like you wanna push this st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sounds like you wanna push this steamin' pile of shit on *anyone* -- and now you've picked Ruby. Well, not on my watch you won't."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You do that, lawman.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You do that, lawman."

fields.Title: You: ""Cut the bullshit. She told me the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cut the bullshit. She told me the truth."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""I won't be on your bulletin board...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I won't be on your bulletin board. If you don't listen to the tape we got *nothing* to talk about."

fields.Dialogue Text: "You hear that, boys?" The man looks around. "Looks like the RCM sent us a big dick cop."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What the fuck is this?" He gets up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What the fuck is this?" He gets up in your face. "You wanna fuck with me?!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [whirling.hardie_logic_wc]
Titus Hardie: ""Oh, this is about him?" He looks a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, this is about him?" He looks around. "A real looker, that one..."

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Wow... the RCM sent us some *big d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wow... the RCM sent us some *big dick cops*."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "He avoided looking her straight in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He avoided looking her straight in the eye -- you would've too.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Yes... normal." He seems to be thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes... normal." He seems to be thinking. "Nothing to do about it now I guess. I just hope she can game her way through the system and come out the other way."

fields.Title: You: ""That's enough for now. I'll get ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's enough for now. I'll get back to the investigation." (Conclude.)

fields.Dialogue Text: "Again? Seriously, man..." He shakes his head. "Fine, fire away."

fields.Dialogue Text: The room is so quiet you could hear a pin drop. The rest of the cafeteria has gone quiet too.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You don't care about *evidence*?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't care about *evidence*?" His eye twitches. "The fuck are you a cop for then?"

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Like she was walking to the gallow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like she was walking to the gallows."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Hardiehub1]
Logic: "He understood what you were doing...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He understood what you were doing. Taking inventory of them.
